resources.string: I am a B.C.A student at Chandigarh University, with a passion for technology. I am an Android and Front-end Web Developer. I like to write blogs, design UI/Mock-ups, and Contribute to open-source projects. I am always looking for new ways to use technology to help others.I am a technology enthusiast, blogger, UI/UX Designer, and open-source contributor. I am always looking for new ways to use technology to help others. I am proficient in C++, C, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, and Bootstrap. I am also familiar with other programming languages and technologies, such as KOTLIN, Java, and React. I have a strong understanding of software development principles and practices and can apply them to real-world projects. I enjoy writing blogs, designing app and website layouts, and contributing to open-source projects in my spare time. Hello World!.
